verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The Of <S%G3588><s%> Achaia. <S%G882><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> Be The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Compassions, <S%G3628><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Encouragement; <S%G3874><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Encourage <S%G3870><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2347><s%> Our Tribulation, <S%G2257><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Able <S%G1410><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To Encourage <S%G3870><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> With Which <S%G3739><s%> We Are Encouraged <S%G3870><s%> Ourselves <S%G846><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Abound <S%G4052><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sufferings <S%G3804><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Abounds <S%G4052><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> Our. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G1535><s%> But Whether <S%G1161><s%> We Are Troubled, It Is <S%G2346><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Being Wrought <S%G1754><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Sufferings <S%G3804><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Suffer, <S%G3958><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> We Are Encouraged, <S%G3870><s%> It Is For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Salvation; <S%G4991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Cur Is <S%G2257><s%> Sure <S%G949><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> You; <S%G5216><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> Partners <S%G2844><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Encouragement. <S%G3874><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Do We Wish <S%G2309><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Be Ignorant <S%G50><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> As To <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2347><s%> Our Tribulation <S%G2257><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Happened <S%G1096><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> <S%G3754><s%> ' That <S%G2596><s%> Excesssively <S%G5236><s%> We Were Burderned <S%G916><s%> Beyond Our <S%G5228><s%> Power, <S%G1411><s%> So As <S%G5620><s%> <S%G1820><s%> For Us To Despair <S%G2248><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Living. <S%G2198><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Ourselves <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sentence <S%G610><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> We Have Had, <S%G2192><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3982><s%> We Should Not Have Trust <S%G5600><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Raises <S%G1453><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead; <S%G3498><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> So Great <S%G5082><s%> A Death <S%G2288><s%> Delivered <S%G4506><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Does Deliver; <S%G4506><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> We Have Hope <S%G1679><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> He Will Deliver; <S%G4506><s%>

Labouring Together <S%G4943><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> By <S%G3588><s%> Supplication, <S%G1162><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Persons <S%G4383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Gift <S%G5486><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Might Be Subject Of Thanksgiving <S%G2168><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2746><s%> Our Boasting <S%G2257><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Simplicity <S%G572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sincerity <S%G1505><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> Fleshly, <S%G4559><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> We Had Our Conduct <S%G390><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> <S%G4056><s%> And More Abundantly <S%G1161><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Other Things <S%G243><s%> Do We Write <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> ' <S%G235><s%> But <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye Read, <S%G314><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Recognize; <S%G1921><s%> <S%G1679><s%> And I Hope <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G2193><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Ye Will Recognize, <S%G1921><s%>

According As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Did Recognize <S%G1921><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G575><s%> Part, <S%G3313><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2745><s%> Your Boasting <S%G5216><s%> We Are, <S%G2070><s%> Even As <S%G2509><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Are <S%G5210><s%> Ours <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> With This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Confidence <S%G4006><s%> I Purposed <S%G1014><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> Previously, <S%G4386><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> A Second <S%G1208><s%> Favour <S%G5485><s%> Ye Might Have; <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> To Pass Through <S%G1330><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> To Be Set Forward <S%G4311><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea. <S%G2449><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> This Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1011><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Purposing, <S%G5100><s%> Indeed <S%G687><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lightness <S%G1644><s%> Did I Use? <S%G5530><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> I Purpose, <S%G1011><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Do I Purpose, <S%G1011><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> There Should Be <S%G5600><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Yea <S%G3483><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nay <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Nay? <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Was Proclaimed, <S%G2784><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not <S%G1096><s%> Yea <S%G3483><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nay, <S%G3756><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Yea <S%G3483><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Has Been. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3745><s%> For Whatever <S%G1063><s%> Promises <S%G1860><s%> Of God There Are, <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Amen, <S%G281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now He Who <S%G1161><s%> Confirms <S%G950><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Anointed <S%G5548><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Is God, <S%G2316><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Sealed <S%G4972><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earnest <S%G728><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Our Hearts. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G1473><s%> But I 1161 CONJ As Witness 3144 N-ASM 3588 T-ASM God 2316 N-ASM Call 1941 V-PMI-1S Upon 1909 PREP 3588 T-ASF My 1699 S-1ASF Soul, 5590 N-ASF That 3754 CONJ Sparing 5339 V-PNP-NSM You 5216 P-2GP Not Yet 3765 ADV Did I Come 2064 V-2AAI-1S To 1519 PREP Corinth. 2882 N-ASF

Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We Rule Over <S%G2961><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Fellow Workers <S%G4904><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5479><s%> Of Your Joy : <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Ye Stand. <S%G2476><s%>
